prompt: A dimly lit, rain-soaked street at night.  Streetlights cast a hazy yellow glow on wet pavement.  Focus on a lone figure walking, head down.
Close-up on the figure's face, reflecting the streetlights' glow in their eyes.  The camera slowly pulls back to reveal the surrounding rain-washed street.
A flashback sequence: A young couple laughing, sharing an umbrella, in a vibrant, bustling night market.  The atmosphere is warm and lively.
Quick cuts between the present-day rainy street and happy memories of the couple together – playful moments, intimate glances, shared smiles.
The female lead stands alone at a carousel, watching it spin.  The carousel is brightly lit, contrasting with the somber surrounding park at night.
Close-up on the woman's hands clutching a carousel horse, her face etched with sadness and longing.  The camera slowly pans to show the empty seats on the carousel.
A montage of scenes reflecting the couple's relationship:  happy moments intercut with moments of growing distance and tension.
A rapid-fire sequence of images showing the passage of time, symbolizing the gradual disintegration of their relationship.
The woman sits alone in a sparsely furnished apartment, surrounded by old photographs and mementos of the past. The room is dim and cold.
Close-up on a single photograph, capturing a happy moment between the couple.  The camera slowly zooms out, revealing the woman’s tear-stained face.
A long shot of the woman walking away from the camera, disappearing into the distance, surrounded by a blurry background suggesting a sense of loneliness.
A slow-motion shot of the woman walking in the rain, each footstep echoing the weight of her sorrow.  The rain intensifies as the scene progresses.
The woman is now standing on a hill overlooking the city, a solitary figure against the vast expanse of city lights at night. A melancholic and contemplative shot.
A dreamy, almost ethereal sequence showing a metaphorical representation of their love – a vibrant flower slowly wilting and dying.
The carousel is shown again, but now completely still and empty.  The camera focuses on a single, abandoned carousel horse, covered in dust and rain.
